div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/contact-point-use

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/contact-point-use
CodeDisplayDefinition
oldOldThis contact point is no longer in use (or was never correct, but retained for records).
tempTempA temporary contact point. The period can provide more detailed information.

title.value: BC Contact Point Use value set.

description.value: BC Contact Point Use value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.
